seg-source.mrk: Memory user defined functions Reference

target.mrk: Memory user defined functions Reference

trans-unit.source: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt. Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

seg-source.mrk: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

target.mrk: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

trans-unit.source: When using them you need to add a #include .

seg-source.mrk: When using them you need to add a #include .

target.mrk: When using them you need to add a #include .

seg-source.mrk: _MemGlobalAlloc

target.mrk: _MemGlobalAlloc

trans-unit.source: Allocates the specified number of bytes from the heap

seg-source.mrk: Allocates the specified number of bytes from the heap

target.mrk: Allocates the specified number of bytes from the heap

seg-source.mrk: _MemGlobalFree

target.mrk: _MemGlobalFree

trans-unit.source: Frees the specified global memory object and invalidates its handle

seg-source.mrk: Frees the specified global memory object and invalidates its handle

target.mrk: Frees the specified global memory object and invalidates its handle

seg-source.mrk: _MemGlobalLock

target.mrk: _MemGlobalLock

trans-unit.source: Locks a global memory object and returns a pointer to the first byte of the object's memory block

seg-source.mrk: Locks a global memory object and returns a pointer to the first byte of the object's memory block

target.mrk: Locks a global memory object and returns a pointer to the first byte of the object's memory block

seg-source.mrk: _MemGlobalSize

target.mrk: _MemGlobalSize

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current size of the specified global memory object

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the current size of the specified global memory object

target.mrk: Retrieves the current size of the specified global memory object

seg-source.mrk: _MemGlobalUnlock

target.mrk: _MemGlobalUnlock

trans-unit.source: Decrements the lock count associated with a memory object that was allocated with GMEM_MOVEABLE

seg-source.mrk: Decrements the lock count associated with a memory object that was allocated with GMEM_MOVEABLE

target.mrk: Decrements the lock count associated with a memory object that was allocated with GMEM_MOVEABLE

seg-source.mrk: _MemMoveMemory

target.mrk: _MemMoveMemory

trans-unit.source: Moves memory either forward or backward, aligned or unaligned

seg-source.mrk: Moves memory either forward or backward, aligned or unaligned

target.mrk: Moves memory either forward or backward, aligned or unaligned

seg-source.mrk: _MemVirtualAlloc

target.mrk: _MemVirtualAlloc

trans-unit.source: Reserves or commits a region of pages in the virtual address space of the calling process

seg-source.mrk: Reserves or commits a region of pages in the virtual address space of the calling process

target.mrk: Reserves or commits a region of pages in the virtual address space of the calling process

seg-source.mrk: _MemVirtualAllocEx

target.mrk: _MemVirtualAllocEx

trans-unit.source: Reserves a region of memory within the virtual address space of a specified process

seg-source.mrk: Reserves a region of memory within the virtual address space of a specified process

target.mrk: Reserves a region of memory within the virtual address space of a specified process

seg-source.mrk: _MemVirtualFree

target.mrk: _MemVirtualFree

trans-unit.source: Releases a region of pages within the virtual address space of a process

seg-source.mrk: Releases a region of pages within the virtual address space of a process

target.mrk: Releases a region of pages within the virtual address space of a process

seg-source.mrk: _MemVirtualFreeEx

target.mrk: _MemVirtualFreeEx

trans-unit.source: Releases a region of pages within the virtual address space of a process

target.mrk: Releases a region of pages within the virtual address space of a process
